channel.title: Emulous
channel.description:
Just working on a server for fun, I'll release the versions as I finish them. The server is pretty easy to program.
[B]Base: [/B]very basic wL
[B]Working on:[/B] PVP
[B]Features:[/B] [B]Version 1.4:[/B] 04/01/09 - Extremely good prayer (att, def, str, prayer work, protect from melee(only one needed atm)) - Prayer switching - Prayer drain rates (prayer bonuses and prayer type counts) - Range improvements (knives, darts, javelins, axes, toktz-xil-ul , seercull and crystal bow with degrading) - Teleporting with ancient and normal magic + bug fixed when players can't see each other - Npc and player melee hit delays added - Npc defense against melee, range and magic (needs a bit more tweaking) - Npc max hit, defence and attack level can be edited in the spawn-config.cfg file - Switching weapons changed a bit [B]only when in combat[/B], see animation gif for more info
[b]Version 1.3:[/b] 30/12/08 Npc combat (hit delays, npc dieing emotes, respawn time) Ranging (bow with arrow requirements, dropping arrows, arrows fired from x and y even when running) Normal and Ancient magic (freezing works, healing blood spell work) Npc Drops (very simple to add new npc) Eating food Dieing Burying bones Most npc update masks Most player update masks
[B]Version 1.2:[/B] 27/12/08 Shops full working 1, 5, 10 - buy and sell items Trading, full working 1, 5, 10, all, x - remove and add items Npc Clicking (shops) Object Clicking (banking)
[B]Version 1.1:[/B] 26/12/08 new packet handling system, thanks graham few improvements
[B]Version 1:[/B] Items leveling, level up interfaces, new refreshskills method Wielding / un-wielding items Dropping and picking up items Item Bonuses Banking Saving and loading NPCs
[B]Pictures:[/B]
[b]Version 1.4[/b] [url=http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/6568/14updatebz6.png]http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/6568/14updatebz6.png[/url]
[b]Weapon switching in combat[/b] [url=http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/3881/emuswitchingweaponsei0.gif]http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/3881/emuswitchingweaponsei0.gif[/url]
[b]Combat:[/b] [url=http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/2838/combatdisplayfg7.png]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/2838/combatdisplayfg7.png[/url]
[B]Shops:[/B] [url=http://img361.imageshack.us/img361/7955/shopvx3.png]http://img361.imageshack.us/img361/7955/shopvx3.png[/url]
[B]Trading:[/B] [url=http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/5995/tradingun1.png]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/5995/tradingun1.png[/url] [url=http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6756/trading2sn2.png]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6756/trading2sn2.png[/url]
[B]Videos:[/B] [b]More range weapons[/b] [url=http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=mna5VESqS1Q]http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=mna5VESqS1Q[/url]
[b]Prayer[/b] [url=http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=cN3mHBYDJ18]http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=cN3mHBYDJ18[/url]
[b]Ancient magic spells[/b] http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=nfk3hptYyy4
[b]Npc Combat[/b] [url=http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dvOwJLyy7PY]http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dvOwJLyy7PY[/url]
[B]Trading[/B] [url=http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dQWqfdklPmY]http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dQWqfdklPmY[/url]
[I]note: character files, shops, npc configs and such found in the bin folder You can configure most of the server by editing the config class (add npc drops, magic requires rune etc) [/I]
[B]Version 1.4:[/B] [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/RLN66S"]http://uppit.com/RLN66S[/URL]
[b]Version 1.3:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/2WZ1IT]http://uppit.com/2WZ1IT[/url]
[B]Version 1.2:[/B] [url=http://uppit.com/V7Z2VC]http://uppit.com/V7Z2VC[/url]
[B]Version 1.1:[/B] [url=http://uppit.com/LGXZUZ]http://uppit.com/LGXZUZ[/url]
enjoy and post any bugs you might find

item.title: Emulous
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

downloaded > compiled >=

.\Server\Server.java:2: package server.util does not exist import server.util.*; ^ .\Server\Server.java:3: package server.players does not exist import server.players.*; ^ .\Server\Server.java:4: package server.npcs does not exist import server.npcs.*; ^ .\Server\Server.java:5: package server.players.items does not exist import server.players.items.*; ^ .\Server\Server.java:6: package server.world does not exist import server.world.*; ^ .\Server\Server.java:57: cannot find symbol symbol : class ItemHandler location: class server.Server public static ItemHandler itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:58: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerHandler location: class server.Server public static PlayerHandler playerHandler = new PlayerHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:59: cannot find symbol symbol : class NPCHandler location: class server.Server public static NPCHandler npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:60: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class server.Server public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:57: cannot find symbol symbol : class ItemHandler location: class server.Server public static ItemHandler itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:58: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerHandler location: class server.Server public static PlayerHandler playerHandler = new PlayerHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:59: cannot find symbol symbol : class NPCHandler location: class server.Server public static NPCHandler npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:60: cannot find symbol symbol : class ShopHandler location: class server.Server public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ .\Server\Server.java:67: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.Server Misc.println("Starting "+Config.SERVER_NAME+" on " + cli entListener.getInetAddress().getHostAddress() + ":" + clientListener.getLocalPor t()); ^ .\Server\Server.java:73: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.Server Misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted fr om "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort()); ^ .\Server\Server.java:76: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.Server Misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "+ connectingHost+":"+s.getPort()); ^ .\Server\Server.java:82: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.Server Misc.println("Error: Unable to startup listener on "+ServerlistenerPort+" - port already in use?"); ^ .\Server\Server.java:83: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class server.Server else Misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down."); ^ 18 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Emulous
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:23, topic:253198”][quote author=hayzie link=topic=334497.msg2604215#msg2604215 date=1230438365]
Base: very basic wL
[/quote]

This is automatically Crap Thanks to that Base. If your going to start from a Base please dont use wL bases. They are horribly coded. Its understandable if you leech something like delta or czar becuase your not starting from strach but this is wasting time.[/quote]No, it’s not crap, he re-wrote it a lot and made it more stable. He did start from scratch, if you downloaded you would of known that, and it even has packaging. wL could be re-written to be the most stable source ever if someone wanted to make it the most stable.

Read full topic

item.title: Emulous
item.dc:creator: @hayzie hayzie
item.description:
@hayzie wrote:

Thanks for the replies, version 1.3 released!

Version 1.3: 30/12/08
Npc combat (hit delays, npc dieing emotes, respawn time)
Ranging (bow with arrow requirements, dropping arrows, arrows fired from x and y even when running)
Normal and Ancient magic (freezing works, healing blood spell work)
Npc Drops (very simple to add new npc)
Eating food
Dieing
Burying bones
Most npc update masks
Most player update masks

Version 1.3:
http://uppit.com/2WZ1IT[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2009, 08:17:59 am[/size][hr]

Version 1.4: 04/01/09

  • Extremely good prayer (att, def, str, prayer work, protect from melee(only one needed atm))
  • Prayer switching
  • Prayer drain rates (prayer bonuses and prayer type counts)
  • Range improvements (knives, darts, javelins, axes, toktz-xil-ul , seercull and crystal bow with degrading)
    -T eleporting with ancient and normal magic + bug fixed when players can’t see each other
  • Npc and player melee hit delays added
  • Npc defense against melee, range and magic (needs a bit more tweaking)
  • Npc max hit, defence and attack level can be edited in the spawn-config.cfg file
  • Switching weapons changed a bit only when in combat, see animation gif for more info

Version 1.4:
http://uppit.com/RLN66S[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2009, 07:03:02 am[/size][hr]Version 1.5: 12/01/09

  • Pvp (melee, range, magic)
  • wildy with single and multi zones work also wildy levels works
  • nice and simple skull system
  • items kept on death can be found in quest tab
  • items dropped and removed when player dies, skull and protect item works etc
  • reduce magic spells like confuse, curse etc works, and player stays immune for a period of time
  • attack option when in wildy and remove when out of wild.
  • teleblock works and you can’t teleport above level 20 wild
  • charge spell temporary increase god spells damage by 10
  • stats reduce after time
  • basic following
  • few bugs fixed

http://uppit.com/BDG6RI

Read full topic

item.title: Emulous
item.dc:creator: @hayzie hayzie
item.description:
@hayzie wrote:

Just working on a server for fun, I’ll release the versions as I finish them.
The server is pretty easy to program.

Base: very basic wL

Working on: PVP

Features:
Version 1.4: 04/01/09

  • Extremely good prayer (att, def, str, prayer work, protect from melee(only one needed atm))
  • Prayer switching
  • Prayer drain rates (prayer bonuses and prayer type counts)
  • Range improvements (knives, darts, javelins, axes, toktz-xil-ul , seercull and crystal bow with degrading)
  • Teleporting with ancient and normal magic + bug fixed when players can’t see each other
  • Npc and player melee hit delays added
  • Npc defense against melee, range and magic (needs a bit more tweaking)
  • Npc max hit, defence and attack level can be edited in the spawn-config.cfg file
  • Switching weapons changed a bit only when in combat, see animation gif for more info

Version 1.3: 30/12/08
Npc combat (hit delays, npc dieing emotes, respawn time)
Ranging (bow with arrow requirements, dropping arrows, arrows fired from x and y even when running)
Normal and Ancient magic (freezing works, healing blood spell work)
Npc Drops (very simple to add new npc)
Eating food
Dieing
Burying bones
Most npc update masks
Most player update masks

Version 1.2: 27/12/08
Shops full working 1, 5, 10 - buy and sell items
Trading, full working 1, 5, 10, all, x - remove and add items
Npc Clicking (shops)
Object Clicking (banking)

Version 1.1: 26/12/08
new packet handling system, thanks graham
few improvements

Version 1:
Items
leveling, level up interfaces, new refreshskills method
Wielding / un-wielding items
Dropping and picking up items
Item Bonuses
Banking
Saving and loading
NPCs

Pictures:

Version 1.4
http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/6568/14updatebz6.png

Weapon switching in combat
http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/3881/emuswitchingweaponsei0.gif

Combat:
http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/2838/combatdisplayfg7.png

Shops:
http://img361.imageshack.us/img361/7955/shopvx3.png

Trading:
http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/5995/tradingun1.png
http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6756/trading2sn2.png

Videos:
More range weapons
http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=mna5VESqS1Q

Prayer
http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=cN3mHBYDJ18

Ancient magic spells

Npc Combat
http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dvOwJLyy7PY

Trading
http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dQWqfdklPmY

note: character files, shops, npc configs and such found in the bin folder
You can configure most of the server by editing the config class (add npc drops, magic requires rune etc)

Version 1.4:
http://uppit.com/RLN66S

Version 1.3:
http://uppit.com/2WZ1IT

Version 1.2:
http://uppit.com/V7Z2VC

Version 1.1:
http://uppit.com/LGXZUZ

enjoy and post any bugs you might find

Read full topic
